data.description: A graphical client for MySQL via CGI
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
In almost every LAMP Application is the need for database
    add/modify/delete-actions (at least for admin businesses).

    This class will provide an very easy access for this actions with
    several possibilities to configure the HTML form: from simple
    labeling to table lookups and basic (at the moment) possibilites for
    referential integrity.

    I ask for this namespace because the module is a MySQL Client and
    it uses the CG-Interface. (Should there a better ideas or
    suggestions I would appreciate, of course).

    I experience a very ease with using this module and I would be glad
    if I could make this module available for everybody who needs it. Of
    course, not at least to get and use response to improve it for my
    own usage
